bibl.title: Late Antique Pagan Networks from Athens to the Thebaid.

series.title: Columbia Studies in the Classical Tradition.

bibl.title: Ancient Alexandria between Egypt and Greece
bibl.author: RUFFINI, Giovanni

bibl.note: Une méthode quantitative (la "social network theory") appliquée aux relations des cercles intellectuels païens d'Athènes et d'Égypte aux Ve et VIe siècles. Leur unité culturelle est assurée par l'intermédiaire d'Alexandrie.
RUFFINI Giovanni, Late Antique Pagan Networks from Athens to the Thebaid.
William V. HARRIS and Giovanni RUFFINI (Edd.), Ancient Alexandria between Egypt and Greece = Columbia Studies in the Classical Tradition. 26 (Leiden, 2004) pp. 241-257, 2 tabl., 1 fig.
